|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 4800 |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1830 P21, 7CK-02 B2 W; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 1150 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC internal photos show an empty socket where a third BCM43684 radio could be so the design is likely shared with the tri-band [[D-Link DIR-X9000]]. FEMs and filters are present for the missing third radio. {{see also|D-Link DIR-X9000|ASUS RT-AX88U}} ==Links of Interest== ===Announced at CES 2018=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33171-d-link-announces-new-wi-fi-systems-routers-and-cameras-at-ces-2018 ''D-Link Announces New Wi-Fi Systems and Routers'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.cnet.com/news/d-link-ax11000-futuristic-router-promises-extreme-speed-ces-2018/ ''D-Link's AX11000 futuristic router promises extreme speed'' on '''C|Net'''] ==See also== *D-Link DIR-X6060 - ''AX6000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 6 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port *[[D-Link DIR-X9000]] - ''AX11000 Ultra Wi-Fi Router'' (Q3 2018) :802.11ax 4x4 MU-MIMO, maximum link rates of 11 Gbps :1x 2.5GbE WAN port, 4x GbE LAN ports, USB 3.0 port :8x high-performance antennas, DLNA, D-Link Wi-Fi App *[[D-Link COVR-2202]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x2 2.4/5GHz, 2x2 5GHz (backhaul), Alexa, $320 (Q2 2018) *[[D-Link COVR-C1203]] - ''AC1200 Dual-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi System'' :WLAN: 2x3 2.4/5GHz, MU-MIMO, Smart Roaming, $250 (Q1 2018) [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2017/33052-d-link-ces-2017-announcements PR] *[[D-Link DIR-2680]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router Powered by McAfee'' :CPU: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] PXB4395EL (GRX350); WLAN: [[Intel (Lantiq)]] WAV500 *[[Norton Core 517]] - ''AC2600 Norton Core Secure WiFi Router'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
